mapper.sql: PROJECT_GROUP_ID, PROJECT_ID, PRODUCT_ID, WORK_CONTENTS, WORK_DETAIL, FINISH_PERCENT, DELAY_REASON, ACCORD_YESTERDAY, IS_IMPORTANT, IS_EMERGENCY, IMPO_LEVEL, ID, DEL_FLAG, STATUS, INST_ID, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_DATE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, REPORT_DATE, PRODUCT_NAME, REPORTER_ID, REPORTER_NAME, INPUT_ORDER, IS_AFTER

t.PROJECT_GROUP_ID, t.PROJECT_ID, t.PRODUCT_ID, t.WORK_CONTENTS, t.WORK_DETAIL, t.FINISH_PERCENT, t.DELAY_REASON, t.ACCORD_YESTERDAY, t.IS_IMPORTANT, t.IS_EMERGENCY, t.IMPO_LEVEL, t.ID, t.DEL_FLAG, t.STATUS, t.INST_ID, t.LOGIN_IP, t.LOGIN_DATE, t.CREATE_BY, t.CREATE_DATE, t.UPDATE_BY, t.UPDATE_DATE, t.REMARKS, t.REPORT_DATE, t.PRODUCT_NAME, t.REPORTER_ID, t.REPORTER_NAME, t.INPUT_ORDER, t.IS_AFTER
mapper.update:
update doufu_today_work set PROJECT_GROUP_ID = #{projectGroupId}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}, WORK_CONTENTS = #{workContents}, WORK_DETAIL = #{workDetail}, FINISH_PERCENT = #{finishPercent}, DELAY_REASON = #{delayReason}, ACCORD_YESTERDAY = #{accordYesterday}, IS_IMPORTANT = #{isImportant}, IS_EMERGENCY = #{isEmergency}, IMPO_LEVEL = #{impoLevel}, ID = #{id}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag}, STATUS = #{status}, INST_ID = #{instId}, LOGIN_IP = #{loginIp}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy}, REMARKS = #{remarks}, REPORT_DATE = #{reportDate}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, REPORTER_ID = #{reporterId}, REPORTER_NAME = #{reporterName}, IS_AFTER = #{isAfter}
id=#{id}

update.foreach:
update doufu_today_work set PROJECT_GROUP_ID = #{projectGroupId}, PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}, WORK_CONTENTS = #{workContents}, WORK_DETAIL = #{workDetail}, FINISH_PERCENT = #{finishPercent}, DELAY_REASON = #{delayReason}, ACCORD_YESTERDAY = #{accordYesterday}, IS_IMPORTANT = #{isImportant}, IS_EMERGENCY = #{isEmergency}, IMPO_LEVEL = #{impoLevel}, ID = #{id}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag}, STATUS = #{status}, INST_ID = #{instId}, LOGIN_IP = #{loginIp}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy}, REMARKS = #{remarks}, REPORT_DATE = #{reportDate}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, REPORTER_ID = #{reporterId}, REPORTER_NAME = #{reporterName}, IS_AFTER = #{isAfter}
id=#{id}

mapper.select:
select wx_user.account as account , wx_user.name as name from wx_user
1=1 and wx_user.dept like "%"#{groupname}"%"
and wx_user.account not in ( select doufu_today_work.REPORTER_NAME from doufu_today_work where doufu_today_work.REPORT_DATE = #{reportdate} )
